October 2007 BUGLE
bugle-showerror 7
bugle-showerror reports errors in OpenGL calls
filterset showerror
Description
This filter-set is a light-weight method of detecting OpenGL errors in applications, where &mp-gldb-gui; is not useable for some reason (for example, when debugging a full-screen application). It writes OpenGL errors to the log (see &mp-log; for details of the log). With the default log settings, the error will be reported to standard error.
